response.job_title: PhD. Candidate| Master in agricultural engineering | Customer service | Customer loyalty | Data science | Irrigation | Marketing | Machine learning | Sales
response.summary:
I am master and agricultural engineer with a deepening in the area of ​​design of irrigation systems and postharvest of fruits and vegetables, with experience in the elaboration and execution of budgeting methods guaranteeing profitability in the proposed projects. Executor of activities to strengthen the tactical sales operation, competitiveness, profitability and positioning of the portfolio of products and brands in the different distribution channels.
During my master has allowed me to join agriculture with machine learning and data science to give a quality leap to the primary sector of the economy of Latin American countries.
My personal experience has allowed me to solve problems with technical foundations without neglecting the scientific method implanted in the academy.
I invite you to build a better future together by preserving natural resources, through the development of new technologies and projects available to agriculture.
Contact me to work together for it, my email is jayepesg@unal.edu.co
response.skills: Relaciones interpersonales, Análisis de datos, Soporte técnico, Producción agrícola, AutoCAD, Marketing de productos, Elaboración de presupuestos, Planificación financiera, Planificación operativa, Comercio, Capacitación técnica, Gestión de proyectos, Gestión de relaciones con clientes, Agricultura, Estrategia de ventas, Microsoft Office, Irrigación

profile_positions.title: Teacher assistant: Refrigeration technology for fruit and vegetable products

profile_positions.description:
-Present the catalog of products and services of the company
-Search potential customers
-Provide support and answer questions to customers
profile_positions.title: Information Communication Technology Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Engineer in charge of irrigation system design and product marketing
-Select equipment for automation and control of hydraulic processes in agriculture
-Promote the use of irrigation controllers to assist the optimization of agricultural work
-Perform topographic surveys and processing of data collected in the field.
-Design of irrigation systems according to the most convenient method (dripping, sprinkling, micro-sprinkling and nebulization).
-Make purchase management and negotiation with suppliers of the items marketed by the company.
-Develop training, operating manuals and advice to the actors of the projects implemented.
profile_positions.title: Agricultural engineer

profile_positions.description:
-Provide training and recommendations for the care and development of different crops to farmers
-Design of irrigation systems, pumping and filtering stations
-Make technical visits to make observations and recommendations of hydraulic type.
-Provide technical assistance in sales and after-sales service of products
profile_positions.title: Engineering Intern

education.field_of_study: Análise de dados aplicada à agricultura
